channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 数以万计的以色列技术工人被卷入与哈马斯的战斗。这正在伤害国民经济最重要的推动力之一。
item.description:
Tens of thousands of Israeli technology workers have been drawn into fighting Hamas. That is hurting one of the most important drivers of the national economy. https://t.co/aMCM2Pzz4v https://t.co/aMCM2Pzz4v

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: Covid 改变了很多东西。其中包括我们对工作的投入我们不再像以前那样关心工作了。
item.description:
Covid changed a lot of things. Among them: Our devotion to our jobs. We don’t care nearly as much about work as we used to. https://t.co/c5hWjVkRnA https://t.co/c5hWjVkRnA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 记者 Leslie T. Chang 在埃及生活多年后发现，阻碍埃及经济发展的最大因素是该国妇女潜力的浪费
item.description:
After living in Egypt for years, journalist Leslie T. Chang found that the biggest thing holding the country back economically is the wasted potential of its women https://t.co/oOZkzlQ3nc https://t.co/oOZkzlQ3nc

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在纽约建房并非易事。把两栋联排别墅合并成一栋 42 英尺宽的豪宅？"人们会受到严重伤害"
item.description:
Building in New York City isn’t a simple feat. Combining two townhouses into one, 42-foot-wide mansion? “People can get seriously hurt.” https://t.co/Kn83wjj7Bu https://t.co/Kn83wjj7Bu

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 现在，在甜味和咸味食谱中，我们都能感受到枫糖浆带来的舒适感
item.description:
Right now we are all about the coziness of maple syrup, in recipes both sweet and savory https://t.co/HHgWQ06Km4 https://t.co/HHgWQ06Km4

item.title: 你的夹克或毛衣到腰带就结束了吗？如果没有巧妙地剪裁，你就错过了一个能让你看起来更高挑的窍门，这些时尚达人如是说。
item.description:
Does your jacket or sweater end at your belt? If it's not subtly cropped you're missing a trick that will make you look taller, say these stylish guys. https://t.co/qVcAzyjnKb https://t.co/qVcAzyjnKb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这款宾利对隐形财富并不感兴趣。它看起来就像 Bentayga 一直向往的超豪华 SUV。
item.description:
This Bentley isn’t interested in stealth wealth. It looks exactly like the over-the-top SUV that the Bentayga has always aspired to be. https://t.co/pP0ldIwZru https://t.co/pP0ldIwZru

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 根据病毒式传播的 "意想不到的红色理论"，一抹令人惊讶的深红色是打造别致生活空间的秘诀。百万 TikTokers 会错了吗？
item.description:
According to the viral “Unexpected Red Theory,” a surprising dash of crimson is the secret to chic living spaces. Can a million TikTokers be wrong? https://t.co/oIQSf3mn2C https://t.co/oIQSf3mn2C

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧胡岛海岸的这一悠闲地带，是威基基和夏威夷岛上其他游客众多的角落的大众旅游市场的一剂良药。以下是游览计划。
item.description:
This laid-back strip of Oahu's coast offers an antidote to the mass-market tourism of Waikiki and other heavily visited corners of the Hawaiian island. Here's how to plan a visit. https://t.co/bcroDqQVQ9 https://t.co/bcroDqQVQ9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯制造坦克、导弹和炮弹的能力令西方国家大吃一惊，也进一步加大了对乌克兰的压力。现在的问题是，这种情况还能持续多久。
item.description:
Russia’s ability to churn out tanks, missiles and shells has surprised the West and heaped further pressure on Ukraine. The question now is how long it can continue. https://t.co/boH7RZiijS https://t.co/boH7RZiijS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 受到美国经济强劲增长的鼓舞，投资者开始转向更广泛的股票，而不仅仅是推动股指创纪录的大型科技公司
item.description:
Investors heartened by strong U.S. growth are turning to a broader set of stocks, rather than just the big tech companies that drove indexes to records https://t.co/RFkH97snTi https://t.co/RFkH97snTi

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 任天堂将根据 "超级马里奥兄弟 "游戏系列制作一部新的动画电影，这是继去年的 "超级马里奥兄弟电影 "大获成功之后的又一部动画电影。
item.description:
Nintendo will produce a new animated film based on the “Super Mario Bros” game franchise, following the blockbuster success of last year’s “The Super Mario Bros. Movie” https://t.co/SH7uLPsY1n https://t.co/SH7uLPsY1n

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）在 #Oscars 颁奖典礼上独占鳌头，共获得七项大奖，包括最佳影片、最佳导演和最佳男主角。艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》获得最佳女主角。
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" dominated at the #Oscars, with seven wins, including best picture, director, and actor. Emma Stone won best actress for "Poor Things." https://t.co/faRwgX1DSe https://t.co/faRwgX1DSe

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》获得 2024 年 #奥斯卡金像奖 # 最佳影片
item.description:
“Oppenheimer” has won Best Picture at the 2024 #Oscars https://t.co/SHkpQ5pcFY https://t.co/SHkpQ5pcFY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 艾玛-斯通凭借《可怜的事》中的角色获得 #奥斯卡最佳女主角：
item.description:
Emma Stone has won the #Oscar for Best Actress for her role in “Poor Things.”

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/SFOeq3oPRk https://t.co/SFOeq3oPRk

item.title: 克里斯托弗-诺兰凭借影片《奥本海默》摘得 #奥斯卡最佳导演奖：
item.description:
Christopher Nolan has taken home the #Oscar for Best Director for his film "Oppenheimer."

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/GtnB5lS8Cb https://t.co/GtnB5lS8Cb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 西里安-墨菲凭借《奥本海默》中的角色获得 #奥斯卡最佳男主角：
item.description:
Cillian Murphy has won the #Oscar for Best Actor for his role in “Oppenheimer.”

Follow along for live updates: https://t.co/VxEWxiYEaU https://t.co/VxEWxiYEaU

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林可能没有摘得金奖，但他带来了粉红色，在 #Oscars 颁奖典礼上活泼地演绎了一首《I'm Just Ken》。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling may not have taken home the gold, but he brought the pink, giving a lively rendition of “I’m Just Ken” at the #Oscars https://t.co/wZjrDurkoa https://t.co/wZjrDurkoa

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 全球新闻机构撤下了一张由王室发布的威尔士王妃与她的孩子们在一起的照片，美联社称这张照片似乎被篡改过
item.description:
Global news agencies pulled a photo released by the royal family showing the Princess of Wales alongside her children, with the Associated Press saying that the image seemed to have been manipulated https://t.co/QCdbH85brl https://t.co/QCdbH85brl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: "马里乌波尔 20 天 "讲述了被困在被围困城市马里乌波尔的一队乌克兰记者的故事，该片荣获 #奥斯卡最佳纪录片奖。"导演 Mstyslav Chernov 说："这是乌克兰历史上第一个奥斯卡奖。
item.description:
“20 Days in Mariupol,” the story of a team of Ukrainian journalists trapped in the besieged city of Mariupol, took home the #Oscar for best documentary film.

“This is the first Oscar in Ukrainian history,” said director Mstyslav Chernov. https://t.co/8RmRSoZmWH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 我们已经提前看到了 Z 世代管理的工作场所的模样。准备好迎接许多变化吧。
item.description:
We’re getting an early glimpse at what Gen Z-run workplaces will look like. Prepare for a lot of changes. https://t.co/RxF6en7SIB https://t.co/RxF6en7SIB

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）出席了今年的金球奖颁奖典礼，为她的电影 "Eras Tour "获得提名助威，引起了热议。但有些斯威夫特人可能会失望地发现，这部演唱会电影并未获得今年奥斯卡奖的提名。
item.description:
Taylor Swift generated buzz when she attended this year’s Golden Globes to support her “Eras Tour” film’s nomination.

But some Swifties may have been disappointed to learn that the concert film wasn't nominated for an Academy Award this year. https://t.co/4wp8uFbW7q

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 小罗伯特-唐尼（Robert Downey Jr）在克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）执导的电影《奥本海默》（Oppenheimer）中饰演了一位爱挑刺的政府官员刘易斯-施特劳斯（Lewis Strauss），一举摘得奥斯卡最佳男配角奖。
item.description:
In a win that pundits had long predicted, Robert Downey Jr. took home the best supporting actor #Oscars statue for playing the prickly government official Lewis Strauss in Christopher Nolan’s "Oppenheimer" https://t.co/ddgoUrrXKk https://t.co/ddgoUrrXKk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在与路易斯安那州立大学（LSU）的 SEC 锦标赛比赛中，身高 6 英尺 7 英寸的头号得分手卡米拉-卡多佐（Kamilla Cardoso）卷入了一场殴斗。
item.description:
No. 1 South Carolina will be without Kamilla Cardoso for its first NCAA women’s tournament game after the 6-foot-7 leading scorer was involved in a tussle in the SEC Championship game against LSU https://t.co/lZpia7lkDv https://t.co/lZpia7lkDv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 吉米-基梅尔（Jimmy Kimmel）把看似裸体的约翰-塞纳（John Cena）哄骗到 #奥斯卡颁奖典礼的舞台上，他只拿着一个信封，信封里藏着他的包裹，里面装着最佳服装设计的结果
item.description:
Jimmy Kimmel coaxed a seemingly nude John Cena onto the #Oscars stage, carrying only an envelope that concealed his package and contained the results of best costume design https://t.co/Ifbpfv02kN https://t.co/Ifbpfv02kN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 2023 年最后一个季度，日本经济按年率计算增长 0.4%，而 2 月中旬公布的初步估计为萎缩 0.4
item.description:
The Japanese economy expanded 0.4% on an annualized basis in the final quarter of 2023, compared with the 0.4% contraction recorded in the preliminary estimate released in mid-February https://t.co/4CwA5bIQ6O https://t.co/4CwA5bIQ6O

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚政府宣布将从 7 月 1 日起取消近 500 项 "扰民 "关税，从而降低从牙刷到过山车和碰碰车等各种产品的进口成本。
item.description:
The Australian government has announced it will abolish close to 500 “nuisance” tariffs from July 1, reducing the cost of importing everything from toothbrushes to roller coasters and bumper cars https://t.co/bVCEbNbvkh https://t.co/bVCEbNbvkh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 达文-乔伊-伦道夫（Da'Vine Joy Randolph）在#奥斯卡颁奖典礼上获得最佳女配角，为她赢得的赞誉画上了圆满的句号。
item.description:
Da’Vine Joy Randolph’s win for best supporting actress at the #Oscars capped a chorus of acclaim that began for her with last fall’s release of “The Holdovers” and grew with every win she racked up https://t.co/5f0NlN4OQE https://t.co/5f0NlN4OQE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 10, 2024
